docs.text: Generative AI in the workforce By Roland Waterson Introduction Something snappy that makes the reader interested, perhaps touch on AI hype? Bring up concerns that people have about AI, especially with job security and ethical problems. Use this as a segue into other sections by saying how this article will alleviate some of those concerns. May be cute to have examples of things I was able to accomplish with AI to break up the text and keep the introduction low level. Go over a quick agenda of what this paper go over. I’m about 80% sure that I will be using the Nutshell schematic linked below, which means I will probably explain what that is here (i.e. sections can be expanded and elaborated on by clicking on hyperlinks).
